suddi (mage kellata mamadareta kiyana nama) ara kellage gedetta kol karala lassanata gema godadala dunna..chththayi mayi pandara 4 bas eke mehen nagga anuradhapure yanna.(echchara durak bas eke giya mulma wathawa saha ayith nam yanne na bas ajiyage sindu ahalama okkareta awilla thibbe hand fri 2ka gahagaththata wadak na eetath wada saddeyi) api yanakota trip eka yanna lasthi wechcha kella tawun ekata awilla mage kellath awilla 4n eken katha karala gema galapuwata kello denna adurana ekak ya denna depaththakata wela innawa.tika welawak mage kella ekka katha kara kara idala eekiwa heta hamba wennam kiyala api araki ekka bas eke nagga ewale thama eekita plan eka kiwuwe.eelagata mage plane widiyata kattiya maradankadawala pot ekakata land kala.femas nathi assaka pihiti rest ekak set karanna kiwwama ape yaluwek thama pot eka set kale..ethanata gihin tikak ra wenakotayi uge amma muththa mathak une.pot eka lassana nisa nidahase inna api rum 2kak buk karagaththa rum kiwuwata thani thaniwa pigiti kabana widiyata thama eewa thiyenne..sallith gewala mayi athulata giye .ehe widuliya na sola sistam ekakin thama liyit denne mada aalokayak dena layit 4n charj karaganna widiyak na..mama hitiya eka mayimata wenna thibba mati pot ekak.depeththe janela 2kak thiyenawa.
